question: Which countries are served by the "Volta River"?
explanation: Volta River flows through Burkina Faso, Ghana and Ivory Coast. Its source is Bobo-Dioulasso highlands of Burkina Faso. The upper part of Volta River-Black Volta, Red Volta, White Volta-flows through Burkina Faso. Then it flows to Ghana and later it empties into Gulf of Guinea, Atlantic Ocean. For hydroelectricity generation purposes, this river has been dammed at Akosombo, Ghana.
